label.phrase: there is still a lot of anger and frustration among shareholders right now

clusterList.phrase: there is still a lot of anger and frustration among shareholders right now
i hope there will be enough shareholder pressure at this meeting for the board to realize they need to bring in someone else to run the company
no matter how strongly a large number of shareholders feel about the board's previous actions

in today's corporate governance system where large mutual funds control so much of the stock it is extremely difficult to oust an entire board no matter how strongly a large number of shareholders feel about the board's previous actions
